Name: Caldi e Freddi
Review Text: Amazing authentic Italian food. Every time I go here there's a huge line and every time it's worth waiting. The focaccia is made fresh here and you can really taste that. The meats are amazing quality. Every time I'm in the neighborhood I need to get a sandwich here!

Name: Caldi e Freddi
Review Text: Top 3 price/quality food in Amsterdam! Quick, cheap and delicious bite, worth standing in line for :)

Name: Caldi e Freddi
Review Text: A lovely, decently spaced out deli that offers a wide array of different pizza, lasagne, desserts and cold cuts. The staff speaks english and is very friendly and accommodating. They seem to be happy to give advice on the food and are forthcoming with personal wishes.

Review Text: This sandwich shop is amazing. Really authentic and the price is just so low for Amsterdam standards that it is hard to believe. Do not be deceived by the looks of the establishment from outside and just enjoy the freshly prepared ciabatta!

Name: Caldi e Freddi
Review Text: Best coffee in Amsterdam and that for proper Italian prices, quick working team, always friendly and delicious food too. When the sun is out and you have some time, get some and go sit at the canal in the sun, best Amsterdam experience in my opinion. I always take all my visiting friends here and they always completely agree.

Name: Caldi e Freddi
Review Text: This is such a nice place to go to. The sandwiches are very good (I tried lots of different ones) and are very affordable. The staff is super friendly, most of them are Italian, and are very fast as well.

Name: Caldi e Freddi
Review Text: Real italian food, great quality-price ratio, friendly staff can give you recommendation. You can ask for your own choice of filling for the sandwich.

Name: Caldi e Freddi
Review Text:
We went there and had calzone with a friend, and it was simply delicious. It was so fresh you can tell it was just made.
Luckily there still are places with something well done in Amsterdam. Now a days, that all the food around has so bad quality! Will definitely come back!

Name: Caldi e Freddi
Review Text: Hands down the best Italian (at least for takeaways) in town. Authentic, extremely cheap, fast and super tasty. The seafood mix & pickled octopus is to die for. On top of all this, the staff is friendly and nice.

Name: Caldi e Freddi
Review Text: A lot of variety of sandwiches which are amazing. Go to place for a quick bite or lunch on the go.

Name: Caldi e Freddi
Review Text: Best sandwich and Italian calzoni in the neighborhood! Cozy and tasty. Staff is very friendly. Nice bench to rest while enjoying a nice coffee or meal if you are sightseeing around the city center. Coffee is very cheap!

Name: Caldi e Freddi
Review Text: Great authentic Italian sandwiches to go. Staff is all Italian and well educated. They know what there selling and what products they're handling. definitely recommend for a quick bite or lunch to go.

Name: Caldi e Freddi
Review Text: Local here. Best panini and coffee for excellent prices!! Almost all Italian staff (and yes they speak English as well). This is my to-go lunch spot when I want to give myself a treat.

Name: Caldi e Freddi
Review Text: Can‚Äôt go wrong with anything you pick up here. Staff is helpful and patient and they have a smooth ticket/number system to make sure everyone gets served. It‚Äôs not a sit down and eat kind of place, but there are one or two seats in there and they will heat up whatever you buy if you just can‚Äôt wait to get it home.

Name: Caldi e Freddi
Review Text: By far the most value for money food in Amsterdam.

Name: Caldi e Freddi
Review Text: Super tasty and super inexpensive. One of the few places in Amsterdam where you can get a slice of Italian-style pizza in a non-sitdown environment, which makes it great for a quick and cheap lunch.

Name: Caldi e Freddi
Review Text: Solid place for sandwiches specially, using italian products, good service, easy process. Always a good option.
